Method used to add new models to the collection. By default, this method just replaces all of the existing models in the collection. Optionally, one may define how models are added to the collection by defining the 'method' attribute of the options argument. 'method' can be either 'replace', 'append', 'prepend', 'merge', or 'insert'. By default, 'replace' is chosen.

items
An array of models to add to the collection.
options
A hash of options to use when filling this collection with the given models. The 'method' attribute of options can be used to dictate how the models are added to this collection. The possible options are:
  • {method: 'replace'} - Replaces all of the elements in the current list of models.
  • {method: 'append'} - Append the items to the end of the collection
  • {method: 'prepend'} - Prepend the items to the beginning of the collection
  • {method: 'merge'} - Update existing models in this collection (based on checking against models with matching 'id' attributes) and push any new items to the end of the collection.
  • {method: 'insert', 'insert_index': 0} - Insert the models at a specific index in the collection. The 'insert_index' option is used to determine which index to insert at. If the insert_index is out of range, the models are appended to the end of the collection otherwise their added before the current model at the specified index.
by default, the 'replace' method is chosen.
item
A model to add to the collection.
options
See Above
var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend(); var Dogs = Falcon.Collection.extend({model: Dog}); var dogs = new Dogs([ {name: "Skip"}, {name: "Spot"} ]); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Skip, Spot] dogs.fill([ {'name': "Fido"}, {'name': "Bump"} ]); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Fido, Bump] var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend(); var Dogs = Falcon.Collection.extend({model: Dog}); var dogs = new Dogs([ {name: "Skip"}, {name: "Spot"} ]); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Skip, Spot] dogs.fill([ {'name': "Fido"}, {'name': "Bump"} ], {method: 'append'}); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Skip, Spot, Fido, Bump] var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend(); var Dogs = Falcon.Collection.extend({model: Dog}); var dogs = new Dogs([ {name: "Skip"}, {name: "Spot"} ]); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Skip, Spot] dogs.fill([ {'name': "Fido"}, {'name': "Bump"} ], {method: 'prepend'}); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Fido, Bump, Skip, Spot] var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend(); var Dogs = Falcon.Collection.extend({model: Dog}); var dogs = new Dogs([ {id: 1, name: "Skip"}, {id: 2, name: "Spot"} ]); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Skip, Spot] dogs.fill([ {id: 2, 'name': "Fido"}, {id: 3, 'name': "Bump"} ], {method: 'merge'}); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Skip, Fido, Bump] var Dog = Falcon.Model.extend(); var Dogs = Falcon.Collection.extend({model: Dog}); var dogs = new Dogs([ {name: "Skip"}, {name: "Spot"} ]); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Skip, Spot] dogs.fill([ {'name': "Fido"}, {'name': "Bump"} ], { method: 'insert', insert_index: 1 }); console.log( dogs.pluck("name") ); // [Skip, Fido, Bump, Spot]
